ygData.subject: Re: The Rescue
ygData.msgSnippet: This post might have some errors in it. Its a bit hard to type and concentrate while your brother is attacking you. ... Reptilica doesn t move as Dinobot

This post might have some errors in it. Its a bit hard to type and 
concentrate while your brother is attacking you.

::Prowl/Reptilica/Other Bots::

Reptilica doesn't move as Dinobot tenses up, knowing that any move for the 
reptile would be suicide. He growls as the other decloak, the rest of the 
Alliance members in the room shifting their weapons. He growls at Tavatron as 
he hears her words.

"Silence, femm!" he yells, pointing his gun at her. He sighs as Prowl's thumb 
twitches dangeroustly over the button, lowering the gun.

Reptilica looks back at Prowl.

"Allright, Maximal," he says, "Give it to me and you have my word that no 
harm will come to you."

Prowl shakes his head, now confident that he had the support of the other 
Maximals there. "As I said before, I'll give it to you at the edge of the 
clearing."

Reptilica growls, turning around to look at the other Alliance members. "Move 
aside. They're coming through."

The others look at him blankly, surprised that he was actually letting the 
Maximals out.

"You heard me! MOVE IT!" Reptilica bellows, losing his temper and aiming his 
gun at Pyro. Pyro growls, aiming his own gun at Reptilica along with the 
other Oblitercons. Reptilica growls, lowering his gun. "Just move it."

Pyro growls again, he and the other Alliance bots backing off into the 
hallway.

"You guys come within ten feet of any of us, and the place blows," Prowl says 
arragontly, walking forward. It wasn't like him to talk like that, but he had 
to act it to look serious about blowing them all to scrap. Reptilica and the 
others back up as Prowl aproaches, careful not to get near him.

"Let's go," Prowl says to the other Maximals as he continues to walk forward, 
dangeroustly holding his thumb over the button.
